channel.title: Comments on: MEETING OF THE CHIEF RABBINATE OF ISRAEL AND THE HOLY SEE
channel.description: notes on Jewish theology and spirituality

item.title: By: David Adatto
item.dc:creator: David Adatto
item.description: I was referring to the following quote,"The Chief Rabbi of Israel, Rabbi Yona Metzger, graced the meeting... "
item.content:encoded: I was referring to the following quote,”The Chief Rabbi of Israel, Rabbi Yona Metzger, graced the meeting… “

item.title: By: Alan Brill
item.dc:creator: Alan Brill
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://kavvanah.wordpress.com/2011/04/01/meeting-of-the-chief-rabbinate-of-israel-and-the-holy-see/#comment-2889">David Adatto</a>.
Do you want to send the other one an email and ask him why he was not there? :) Technically, they were calling Rabbi Shaar Yashuv- chief rabbi of Haifa- he was the host. Other participants included Kiryat Ono Chief Rabbi Rasson Arussi, Savion Chief Rabbi David Brodman. Rabbi Arussi was your Sefardi representative.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to David Adatto.

Do you want to send the other one an email and ask him why he was not there? ðŸ™‚
Technically, they were calling Rabbi Shaar Yashuv- chief rabbi of Haifa- he was the host.
Other participants included Kiryat Ono Chief Rabbi Rasson Arussi, Savion Chief Rabbi David Brodman.
Rabbi Arussi was your Sefardi representative.

item.title: By: David Adatto
item.dc:creator: David Adatto
item.description: I thought Israel had two Chief Rabbis.
item.content:encoded: I thought Israel had two Chief Rabbis.
